title: Making SolrEventListener CoreAware
description:
At the moment there is no way to determine which core fired an event (e.g. postCommit, postSoftCommit etc...)
Would be a really easy change and incredibly useful for those looking to hook into solr to a more advanced degree.

comments.author: Christine Poerschke
comments.content: https://svn.apache.org/viewvc/lucene/solr/trunk/src/java/org/apache/solr/core/AbstractSolrEventListener.java?r1=573893&r2=573892&pathrev=573893 added SolrCore to AbstractSolrEventListener, wondering if AbstractSolrEventListener might be an alternative to making SolrEventListener CoreAware?
